## Introduction

## Model Implementation
```{r}
# Load required libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(deSolve)
library(sensitivity)
library(here)
```

#### Model Run
```{r}
# Bring in the model
source(here("R","forestgrowth.R"))

# Set the parameters
tm <- seq(from = 1, to = 300)
Pinitial <- 1
gps <- list(threshold = 50, K = 250, r = 0.01, g = 2)
res <- ode(Pinitial, tm, forestgrowth, gps)
colnames(res) <- c("time", "carbon")

ggplot(as.data.frame(res), aes(time, carbon)) +
  geom_point()
```
